Name: 0 Day
About the game: Freedom of movement with flight, touch pad, and teleportation! Move through the city hunting down your enemies with a growing assortment of weapons from home-made spears to assault rifles! Sneak up on armed targets to catch them off guard! Or maneuver at full speed around bullets and bat their head off into the distance! Can you take back control of the city from the terrorist and infected? Help shape the game and give us feedback as we work to make the game just how you want it! We encourage you to read our early access plans before purchasing! As development continues, more scenarios, features, and content will be added including a more in-depth rts mode and active cities! ALL customer feedback gets taken into account in decision making, so we can promise you that you will be heard!
